mapper.sql: select id, name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, status, ifnull(perms,'') as perms, icon, create_time from pbms_menu
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms, '') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM pbms_menu m WHERE m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') AND m.status = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms, '') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM pbms_menu m LEFT JOIN pbms_role_menu rm ON ro.menu_id = m.id LEFT JOIN pbms_role r ON rm.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN pbms_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN pbms_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') AND m.status = 0 AND ro.status = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pbms_menu WHERE parent_id = #{parentId};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pbms_menu WHERE name = #{name};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pbms_menu ( id, name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time , remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{parentId}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{isFrame}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime} , #{remark} );
mapper.delete: UPDATE pbms_menu set status = 2 where id = #{id};
